Just as Portugal’s iconic blue azulejo tiles create a mosaic of beauty, this 9-day journey blends the best of two sun-drenched countries into one unforgettable escape. Spend two nights each in Barcelona, Madrid, Seville, and Lisbon, travelling from the sparkling Mediterranean to the golden Atlantic. Discover Barcelona’s bold architecture, Madrid’s artistic flair, Seville’s medieval charm, and Lisbon’s cobbled streets and tiled facades. Along the way, immerse yourself in history, culture, and cuisine - savoring Portugal’s port wine and soulful fado as well as Spain’s Rioja and fiery flamenco.
